##Question 1, 2, 3

```{r}
Dists <- dist(mtcars)

Dendrogram <- hclust(Dists)
ddata <- ggdendro::dendro_data(Dendrogram)

ggdendro::ggdendrogram(Dendrogram,rotate = TRUE) + geom_text(data = ddata$labels, aes(x = x,y = y, label = label, vjust = 0))
```
```{r}
NCI60

N_NCI60 <-
  NCI60 %>%
  gather(key = cellLine,value = expression, BR.MCF7:RE.UO_31) %>%
  arrange(Probe)

N_NCI60

N2_NCI60 <-
  N_NCI60 %>%
  group_by(Probe,cellLine) %>%
  summarise(expression = mean(expression)) %>%
  ungroup()

N2_NCI60

relevant_probes <-
  N2_NCI60 %>%
  group_by(Probe) %>%
  summarise(spread = sd(expression))

relevant_probes

nrow(relevant_probes)

scary_probes <-
  relevant_probes %>%
  filter(spread > 1.5)

nrow(scary_probes)

scary_probes



scary_probes_N <-
  scary_probes %>%
  left_join(N2_NCI60)

nrow(scary_probes_N)

```
